description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Nouvelle histoire des voyages et des grandes découvertes géographiques ... Ouvrage illustré ... d'après les dessins de Sahib, etc" Author: CORTAMBERT, Richard. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10027.k.5." Page: 531 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1883 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000791359 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
